about:
Hi there! Thank you for visiting my page.
  I specialize in logo design. I strive for simplicity and minimalism in my design style. At the same time, I try to express the essence of your company in my logos. My catchy logos are simple in the perception and can lead your business to success.
  If you need the logo design done, feel free to contact me.

about: I create illustrations and logo/web/social media designs.
tags: ['Entry Level']

about:
In my artworks I adhere to internal realism. I find in bright coloring art that really excites me. I find inspiration in momentary associations like a real musical improvisation, but on canvas.
  When I saw artworks of Joan Miro, Shagal and Kandinsky, I realy heard how they sound. This inspired me to find treasure internally my mind and to remove many restrictions.

about:
Hello! I'm a Media and Advertisement Design student from Estonia.
  I've mostly done individual work and school work related to graphic design and illustration. I have done some works for clients including cover arts for singles and a small illustrated book.
  I've also been an intern at a graphics design firm.
  In my school years I've mastered Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
  I'm mostly interested in illustrative work but logos interest me as well. I'm up for a challenge!

Cannot recommend highly enough', 'Hi AlexNo worries at all and it is a pleasure to work on your label project.  I am currently based in the Cape Winelands, South Africa (but bounce between here and Bordeaux, France).  I have close family that lives in Australia too :-)  My email address is:kelly@breede.co.zaI work internationally so time differences are something that I am well used to and adapt accordingly.  I too would welcome working with you in the future, please do get in touch when you require my services.  On the current Roseville project, please email me if you have any questions or if your printer has any questions, I would also like to look at the proof that the printer draws up before going to print so that I can make 100% sure that everything is perfect before they do the print run.  I would also like to do your back label, so when you are ready, please email me (to the above address) with the information and I can do the artwork.I thoroughly enjoyed the project!Kind RegardsKelly (BankSea)', 'This designer was patient and worked with me helping me create exactly what I didn’t know I was looking for!! about:
I'm u_nlmtd, a freelance graphic designer. I was born in Yogyakarta, the city of art and culture.
  Art is my passion. And logo designing is my specialty.
  Giving the best for all my clients is a great achievement for me.
  So if you need a logo or some great designs don't hesitate to contact me.

about:
Designing and painting are two passions of mine.
  Painting is a hobby that I developed when I was very young while designing is a hobby found later in life that grew on me with each passing year.

about: I would love to work 1-on-1 with you to create the perfect design to fit your company! Feel free to get in touch with me and ask any questions. I am a stay at home mom who love's to design in my spare time! Being a self taught graphic designer, I don't know all techniques, but it is so fun learning and expanding my knowledge everyday. I will work diligently to make a logo exactly what you want. Your satisfaction is very important to me!

about:

about:
Hi! I am a passionate graphic designer based in Asia, with 5+ years of experience. I am an expert in creating brands that help your business appear professional, visually appealing and most importantly, convey effectively your company's ethos and values
  to your target market. I'm a perfectionist by nature and all my work reflects that. So if you need a professional logo and brand identity, I am here to create it!

about: Worked 13 years in the I&D department of Ambar, SA as an artist & designer, then started as a freelancer. I’ve a vast experience in drawing (manual or vector art) photo/retouching, editing and final arts. After graduating in Marketing Management at the Portuguese School of Marketing (IPAM), made professional trainings in Photoshop, Freehand, Illustrator, QuarkXpress & Indesign. Attended a workshop called Drawing in Action by the School of Arts in Vila Nova de Cerveira. www.artespraticas.com

about:
Ho un esperienza decennale in questo settore, ho creato decine di loghi per diverse aziende. Nella creazione di un logo ho un unico motto: il logo deve comunicare i valori e la mission dell'azienda. Per questo motivo, rivolgo al cliente un unica domanda: cosa vuoi comunicare?
  Il mio compito è tradurre tutto questo in un marchio che deve imprimersi nella mente delle persone e distinguersi sul mercato.
